levels.description:
Gains <@ba.vup>+{attack_speed}</> ASPD; while skill is active, can deploy a Support Drone
<@ba.rem>After deployment, allies near the drones gain {damage_resistance_scale} times the effect of Talent 1; self-destructs when skill ends or Silence The Paradigmatic retreats</>
